mapper.select: select year(create_time) as year,MONTH(create_time) as month,count(1) as count from mesys_ticket_detail where is_deleted = 1 and status = 1 group by year(create_time),MONTH(create_time) having CONCAT(year,LPAD(month,2,0)) BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startYear},LPAD(#{startMonth},2,0)) and CONCAT(#{endYear},LPAD(#{endMonth},2,0))
